CustomField.description: If set to false, the replacement will only be once when the replacement period starts. If set to true, every run of the replacement batch job checks for new records that should be transferred to the replacement user.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set to false, the replacement will only be once when the replacement period starts. If set to true, every run of the replacement batch job checks for new records that should be transferred to the replacement user.
CustomField.label: Continous Replacement
